location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: ‘Secret Letters received, by way of Marseilles, June 8: 1857.’

mods.abstract: This bundle consists of summaries of letters, sent by way of Marseilles, from the Governor General of India in Council (2 May 1857, Numbers 20-22), and from Bombay [presumably the Government of Bombay] (11 May, Numbers 99-104).The summaries relate to Candahar [Kandahar or Qandahar], China, Sarawak, Persia, and Aden.

name.namePart: Viceroy and Governor-General of India in Council
